name: google - simply Widen Result Column
description:
Simply, adjust the width of google search results.

Features
 - Simple (for combination with others)
 - Maintained (until I quit using this)

REQUIRED: "Adblock Plus" with EasyList subscription
https://addons.mozilla.org/en-us/firefox/addon/1865 (Firefox Addon for Anti-Advertisement)
http://adblockplus.org/en/subscriptions (See top of the list for EasyList)
